content: That's really helpful, thank you! I think I'll serve Omija tea as a palate cleanser between courses, and offer Yujacha tea as a refreshing beverage to pair with the meal. I'll make sure to brew them according to your instructions and serve them in traditional Korean tea cups with a few garnishes to add a pop of color and fragrance. By the way, have you heard about that new Korean market that just opened up downtown? I heard they have an amazing selection of Korean ingredients and tea utensils.
